statements: SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock > 100;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, restock_level FROM Inventory ORDER BY restock_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE sales_data ->> 'date' = '2021-10-15';
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock < restock_level;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC, current_stock DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock < restock_level
SELECT product_name, current_stock, sales_data -> 'sales_month' AS monthly_sales FROM Inventory WHERE sales_data ->> 'sales_month' > '5000'
SELECT product_name, SUM(current_stock) AS total_stock FROM Inventory GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_stock DESC
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM Inventory WHERE product_name LIKE 'P%'
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, current_quantity FROM Inventory WHERE current_quantity < 50;
SELECT product_name, initial_quantity, sales_count FROM Inventory WHERE initial_quantity > 100 AND sales_count < 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_quantity, initial_quantity FROM Inventory WHERE current_quantity < initial_quantity;
SELECT restock_id, product_id, restock_quantity, restock_date FROM Restock ORDER BY restock_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE current_quantity < 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, initial_quantity, current_quantity FROM Inventory WHERE sales_count > 100 ORDER BY current_quantity DESC

SELECT product_name, initial_quantity, current_quantity, sales_count FROM Inventory JOIN Restock ON Inventory.product_id = Restock.product_id WHERE restock_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY product_name HAVING SUM(restock_quantity) > 50

SELECT i.product_name, r.restock_quantity, r.restock_date FROM Inventory i INNER JOIN Restock r ON i.product_id = r.product_id WHERE i.initial_quantity < i.current_quantity AND r.restock_quantity > 10 ORDER BY r.restock_date DESC

SELECT i.product_name, i.current_quantity, SUM(r.restock_quantity) AS total_restock FROM Inventory i LEFT JOIN Restock r ON i.product_id = r.product_id GROUP BY i.product_name HAVING total_restock > 0
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < restock_threshold;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, quantity_sold FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory WHERE restock_threshold = 50;
SELECT restock_date, product_id, restock_quantity FROM restocking WHERE restock_quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < restock_threshold;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_quantity_sold FROM sales GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, quantity_sold, sale_amount FROM sales WHERE sale_amount > 100 ORDER BY sale_date;
SELECT restock_id, restock_date, restock_quantity FROM restocking WHERE restock_quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM product_inventory;
SELECT product_name, in_stock_qty FROM product_inventory WHERE in_stock_qty > 0;
SELECT product_name, last_restock_date FROM product_inventory ORDER BY last_restock_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, in_stock_qty FROM product_inventory WHERE in_stock_qty < 10 ORDER BY in_stock_qty ASC;
SELECT product_name, in_stock_qty, last_restock_date FROM product_inventory WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM product_inventory WHERE in_stock_qty > 0;
SELECT product_name, in_stock_qty FROM product_inventory ORDER BY in_stock_qty DESC;
SELECT product_name, in_stock_qty, last_restock_date FROM product_inventory WHERE last_restock_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT p.product_name, s.sale_qty, s.sale_amount FROM product_inventory p JOIN sales_data s ON p.product_id = s.product_id WHERE s.sale_amount > 100;
SELECT product_name, in_stock_qty, rs.restock_date FROM product_inventory JOIN restock_history rs ON product_inventory.product_id = rs.product_id ORDER BY rs.restock_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < restock_level;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT MAX(sale_quantity) AS max_quantity FROM sales;
SELECT product_name, restock_date, restock_quantity FROM restock_history ORDER BY restock_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT product_name, sale_date, sale_quantity FROM sales WHERE sale_quantity >= 10 AND sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT product_name, restock_quantity, restock_date FROM restock_history INNER JOIN inventory ON restock_history.product_id = inventory.product_id
SELECT product_name, total_sales FROM sales_summary JOIN products ON sales_summary.product_id = products.product_id WHERE total_sales < 1000 ORDER BY total_sales
